amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a classified report describing the security vulnerabilities of the Nation's pipelines and oil refineries to Congress no later than 120 days after the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that the Secretary of Homeland Security shall submit a classified report describing the security vulnerabilities of the nation's pipelines and oil refineries to Congress no later than 120 days after the enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
